detail_desc: Wide-fitting, V-neck top in ribbed jersey with a large hood and long sleeves.
Wide-fitting, V-neck top in ribbed jersey with a large hood and long sleeves.

Dungaree shorts in washed stretch denim with buttons at the top and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Zip fly and button, a small chest pocket, fake front pockets, real back pockets and embroidered appliqués on the legs.

Baby Exclusive. Comfort blankets in an organic cotton waffle weave. Size 50x50 cm.

Baby Exclusive Top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with pompoms front and back and concealed press-studs at the back of the neck. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Dress in an airy, patterned silk and cotton weave with a small, drawstring stand-up collar with long ties, concealed press-studs at the top and long sleeves with pin-tucks and flared cuffs. Pleats at the back and hem for added width, and a double layer at the hem with an overlocked edge. Unlined.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Calf-length jumpsuit in stretch cotton twill with a collar, metal press-studs at the front and seam at the waist. Low crotch, side pockets, patch back pockets and flared legs with a slit at the hems.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Calf-length jumpsuit in stretch cotton twill with a collar, metal press-studs at the front and seam at the waist. Low crotch, side pockets, patch back pockets and flared legs with a slit at the hems.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Calf-length dress in a heavily draping viscose crêpe weave with a raw-edge neckline, pin-tucks and a concealed zip at the top. Long raglan balloon sleeves, close-fitting, buttoned cuffs with raw-edge organza trims, and a raw-edge hem. The dress is in a straight cut with width towards the hem. Unlined.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Flared trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, back pockets and slim-cut legs with sewn-in creases and flared hems.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Flared trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, back pockets and slim-cut legs with sewn-in creases and flared hems.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Trenchcoat in sturdy cotton with contrasting colour seams. Collar and shoulder tabs with metal press-studs, partly concealed buttons down the front and flare to the hem. Flap patch front pockets with a concealed press-stud and a soft, detachable belt with a metal buckle. Unlined.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Sleeveless, straight-cut top in airy cotton poplin with a collar, concealed zip at the back and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Sleeveless, straight-cut top in airy cotton poplin with a collar, concealed zip at the back and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Tunic in a gently draping crêpe weave with a stand-up collar with metal eyelets and a tab with a metal fastener at the top. Draped front, yoke at the back with a pleat for added width, long sleeves and wide, close-fitting cuffs with a slit and press-stud. High slits in the sides and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Short-sleeved dress in a cotton weave with an opening and a button at the back of the neck and frilled shoulders.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Flared shirt in cotton poplin with a large collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back with a pleat for added width. Long sleeves, wide, flared cuffs with a slit and ties, and high slits in the sides of the hem.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Flared shirt in cotton poplin with a large collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back with a pleat for added width. Long sleeves, wide, flared cuffs with a slit and ties, and high slits in the sides of the hem.
